short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple new-tab-dashboard for your daily schedule

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open a new tab of your browser and get quick access to
- a nice and minimal clock
- the most important Google Apps like Gmail, Maps, Keep and Photo
- your favorite social networks.

IN THIS VERSION (0.1.3):
- 4 beautiful themes
- new quicklinks: google drive and youtube.

And the future?

Many new feature are in development right now, when you are reading this!
It's a brand new project, so there are a lot of ideas you will be able to touch and use in the next releases.

For example:

- sync with your google account for a completely personal experience
- manage and customize quicklinks with your own bookmarks and web apps
- themes and interface customization
.. and many more awesomeness to come!

Keep in touch!
